00027     class BoolOperation : public AsyncOperation {
00028     public:
00029 
00033         BoolOperation(Callback<bool> *c) {
00034             cb = c;
00035         }
00036 
00037     protected:
00041         Callback<bool> *cb;
00042     };

00047     class ResetOperation : public BoolOperation {
00048     public:
00049         ResetOperation(Callback<bool> *c) : BoolOperation(c) {}
00050 
00054         bool execute(KVStore *tut) {
00055             tut->reset();
00056             bool t = true;
00057             cb->callback(t);
00058             return true;
00059         }
00060     };

00065     class NOOPOperation : public BoolOperation {
00066     public:
00067         NOOPOperation(Callback<bool> *c) : BoolOperation(c) {}
00068 
00072         bool execute(KVStore *tut) {
00073             bool rv = true;
00074             cb->callback(rv);
00075             return true;
00076         }
00077     };

00160     class AsyncQueue {
00161     public:
00162 
00166         AsyncQueue() {
00167             pthread_mutex_init(&mutex, NULL);
00168             pthread_cond_init(&cond, NULL);
00169         }
00170 
00174         ~AsyncQueue() {
00175             pthread_cond_destroy(&cond);
00176             pthread_mutex_destroy(&mutex);
00177         }
00178 
00184         void addOperation(AsyncOperation *op) {
00185             LockHolder lh(&mutex);
00186             ops.push(op);
00187             if(pthread_cond_signal(&cond) != 0) {
00188                 throw std::runtime_error("Error signaling change.");
00189             }
00190         }
00191 
00201         void drainTo(std::queue<AsyncOperation*> &out) {
00202             LockHolder lh(&mutex);
00203             if(ops.empty()) {
00204                 if(pthread_cond_wait(&cond, &mutex) != 0) {
00205                     throw std::runtime_error("Error waiting for signal.");
00206                 }
00207             }
00208             for(int i = 0; i < MAX_DRAIN && !ops.empty(); i++) {
00209                 out.push(ops.front());
00210                 ops.pop();
00211             }
00212         }
00213 
00214     private:
00215         pthread_mutex_t             mutex;
00216         pthread_cond_t              cond;
00217         std::queue<AsyncOperation*> ops;
00218     };
00219 
00223     class AsyncExecutor {
00224     public:
00225 
00230         AsyncExecutor(KVStore *d, AsyncQueue *q) {
00231             tut     = d;
00232             iq      = q;
00233             running = true;
00234         }
00235 
00239         void run() {
00240             while(running) {
00241                 std::queue<AsyncOperation*> ops;
00242                 iq->drainTo(ops);
00243                 tut->begin();
00244                 int count = 0;
00245 
00246                 while(!ops.empty()) {
00247                     AsyncOperation *op = ops.front();
00248                     ops.pop();
00249 
00250                     op->execute(tut);
00251                     count++;
00252                 }
00253 
00254                 tut->commit();
00255             }
00256         }
00257 
00258     private:
00259         bool            running;
00260         KVStore *tut;
00261         AsyncQueue     *iq;
00262     };
00263 
00264     static void* launch_executor_thread(void* arg) {
00265         AsyncExecutor *executor = (AsyncExecutor*) arg;
00266         try {
00267             executor->run();
00268         } catch(...) {
00269             std::cerr << "Caught a fatal exception in the thread" << std::endl;
00270         }
00271     }
00272 
00276     class QueuedKVStore : public KVStore {
00277     public:
00278 
00282         QueuedKVStore(KVStore *t) {
00283             tut = t;
00284             iq = new AsyncQueue();
00285             executor = new AsyncExecutor(tut, iq);
00286 
00287             if(pthread_create(&thread, NULL, launch_executor_thread, executor)
00288                != 0) {
00289                 throw std::runtime_error("Error initializing queue thread");
00290             }
00291         }
00292 
00296         ~QueuedKVStore() {
00297             delete iq;
00298             delete executor;
00299         }
00300 
00304         void reset() {
00305             std::queue<AsyncOperation*> opq;
00306             RememberingCallback<bool> cb;
00307             iq->addOperation(new ResetOperation(&cb));
00308             cb.waitForValue();
00309         }
00310 
00314         void set(std::string &key, std::string &val,
00315                  Callback<bool> &cb) {
00316             iq->addOperation(new SetOperation(key, val, &cb));
00317         }
00318 
00322         void get(std::string &key, Callback<GetValue> &cb) {
00323             iq->addOperation(new GetOperation(key, &cb));
00324         }
00325 
00329         void del(std::string &key, Callback<bool> &cb) {
00330             iq->addOperation(new DeleteOperation(key, &cb));
00331         }
00332 
00337         void noop(Callback<bool> &cb) {
00338             iq->addOperation(new NOOPOperation(&cb));
00339         }
00340 
00341     private:
00342         KVStore *tut;
00343         AsyncQueue     *iq;
00344         AsyncExecutor  *executor;
00345         pthread_t       thread;
00346     };
00347
